title: Atheist

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this role rolls, all other players must be roles from the good faction. Then, reroll this role to a random role from the good faction, and for the rest of the game, the host may:
> - Kill up to three players each night, disguising their causes of death as having been attacked by another role
> - Have players' roles appear to be other ones upon death
> - Give players false night feedback messages.
- For the rest of the game, the host can be hanged. If they are, they die, the game ends, and the good faction wins the game. Otherwise, the game cannot enter a game end state until only one player is alive, at which point the host wins the game.
